title: Average player salary in the Scottish Premiership 2019/20 , by team
yAxis: Average player salary in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: The Average player Team in the Scottish Premiership was Team Aberdeen , who made 1119.46 player .
The most player Team was Hibernian , with just 51.44 player .

In second place was Team Rangers with 812.21 player ; third place went to Team Celtic with 1119.46 player ; fourth place went to Team Hamilton with 51.44 player and fifth place went to Team Hearts , who was 172.43 player .
gold: In the 2019/2020 season , Celtic was the highest paying club in Scottish Premiership . The average annual player salary in that season was 1.12 million U.S. dollars , while in Hamilton , the lowest paying club in the Scottish Premiership , it was 51.44 thousand U.S. dollars . 12 clubs consistently play in the Scottish Premiership .
